47472eacd56067e2fab3cbd8bf61b690.string: Money built for you, not banks

3cd02bb6af846d2f2e2ec39b510e7bfb.string: Bitcoin Cash makes money work for you. Pay people fast, send money abroad basically for free, and store savings securely—all without middlemen controlling your funds.

a93ad13582036c6c06c4ddffba43018b.developer_comment: Primary button of the hero section

0c996a190077b39e16d6026c2e5b07c4.developer_comment: Secondary button of the hero section

18233739ba6722328e10e915aee4e31d.developer_comment: Call to action for the 'spend from your phone' feature

d4a3c5e1ce22110c4456a05a3e8b40de.string: Coffee to go? Time for a new laptop? Get it with Bitcoin Cash at an increasing number of participating websites and stores. Simply scan to check out, just like Google Pay.

2830fdff024a8df7092f940add52d98d.string: Send money abroad basically for free

28fb543692f582d63dbf7a591ac93f5b.developer_comment: Call to action for the 'send money abroad' feature

0d34277d3cb1b937f8467106579c155f.string: On average, banks take a 6.8% cut out of the money you send home. Bitcoin Cash is much cheaper—and faster, too. Use it to send remittances for less than a cent.

e90ea55000f507da66e6ae827ad62775.string: Pay with the privacy of cash

3d65dbf9cddca9e877ad9fea43f29e2f.developer_comment: Call to action for the 'pay privately' feature

1de5d67777a77620f0927972c8c58392.string: Since a bank account is tied to your identity, your transaction history is, too. Bitcoin Cash is the opposite: nobody knows who you are and payments can be sent privately.

53991ca9a39cc4478c77f393388aa482.string: Pay online without a bank account

15822f7cae3c9ac02127674ab19397a3.developer_comment: Call to action for the 'no bank needed' feature

fd01af7df67ffebb8dee09e313fb4a96.string: Too far away? Too many fees? Whatever your reason for not owning a bank account, Bitcoin Cash can help. Use it to pay and get paid online without the need for banks.

b410d412e2ab6f26936b286fedce5b53.developer_comment: Call to action for the 'pay friend directly' feature

b40dafc1e3655d2e5cbac924ac784083.string: Splitting the bill? Send money to your friend's wallet or have them send it to yours instead. Payments are fast and go directly between the two of you—no banks needed.

a3598cd85f5fe560d14f10ecc7cfe1b5.string: Store savings in a safer place

79c193971b8973d7146a9bf0aaa22ca6.developer_comment: Call to action for the 'store securely' feature

2a944fd5c6bd0c6d8b1fcf70b4463fa7.string: Scammers can pretend to be your bank, using scare tactics to trick you into sending them money. Bitcoin Cash fixes this trust issue by removing third parties altogether.

6066503799cce63c9d917321fa976676.string: How can my business use Bitcoin Cash?

6bb5f8c640b64c0c0be50526d4779fb1.string: As a merchant one of your main goals is to be able to accept and process payments as quickly and seamlessly as possible so you can make your customers happy and receive payments without any headaches. Bitcoin Cash is the solution, as it has fast and low-cost transactions. As the world goes digital, electronic currencies such as Bitcoin Cash are becoming the go-to method for paying online and in retail shops. Third-party providers make it easy to accept Bitcoin Cash using their platforms. When you sign up for a third-party merchant solutions application such as BitPay, you simply setup your account so that you can receive Bitcoin Cash and have it sent to your Bitcoin Cash wallet or you can convert your Bitcoin Cash to your local fiat currency. Most shops do a split where some funds are liquidated to fiat and some are held in crypto. Either way, by setting up a merchant solutions application you can begin accepting Bitcoin Cash payments today without worrying about the complexities of how to accept Bitcoin Cash.

2cfcc5a7f9bcff424fc9b19fa98364a8.string: How do I get Bitcoin Cash?

9e3e4814a10e465c3e2fd236e96dd1ac.string: The two easiest ways to get Bitcoin Cash is to buy or work for it. Buying Bitcoin Cash is the most used and convenient way, where all you have to do is sign up for a Bitcoin exchange and deposit funds so you can convert it to Bitcoin Cash. The exchange will send you Bitcoin Cash after the trade has occurred. The other option is to earn Bitcoin Cash by working for it, for example finding a job on a job board that pays in Bitcoin Cash or creating your own service (selling t-shirts for example) and earning Bitcoin Cash.

bcbcf60faa6551cde4df015110ba931d.string: Where can I find Bitcoin Cash locally?
bcbcf60faa6551cde4df015110ba931d.developer_comment: Buy page subtitle for finding bitcoin cash locally

4fe3626b7a5a84066dc77dc4b0bc6724.string: In many cities there is a market of Over The Counter (OTC) traders who trade fiat (such as USD, Yen, Euro, etc) for Bitcoin Cash. Or consider asking your employer if they would be willing to be at the forefront of the future of money and offer partial or complete payment in Bitcoin Cash. Some larger cities are also equipped with a Bitcoin Cash enabled ATM machine which make it very easy to trade in fiat for Bitcoin Cash. Ask at your nearest {=Bitcoin Cash Meetup} about other options, or consider visiting restaurants in your city where you can {=spend Bitcoin Cash} and enquire there.

fd3c450b48cfba87fe672e03c08adb75.developer_comment: In the phrase: "In many cities there is a market of Over The Counter (OTC) traders who trade fiat (such as USD, Yen, Euro, etc) for Bitcoin Cash. 9c21db44d680bc24b4cc2626bc7fa6d1.string: Can I buy Bitcoin Cash Online?
9c21db44d680bc24b4cc2626bc7fa6d1.developer_comment: Buy page subtitle for buying bitcoin cash online

d8e0edb9fb1d10c788250d72528da332.string: Buying Bitcoin Cash online is the most popular way to receive Bitcoin Cash. Online Exchanges which buy and sell local currency and cryptocurrencies allow you to perform bank transfers to trade for Bitcoin Cash. Some even accept credit card for immediate purchase. As with any online purchase, do your own research and ensure you have a your own wallet. We do not recommend leaving any Bitcoin Cash on exchanges. You should always store your Bitcoin Cash on your own wallet that's been safely backed up.

e3f34224a984c5401b8ea0ee050da8df.string: Where can I get Bitcoin Cash?

4ae560b5f5e9e7e0d5343cebb0030a33.developer_comment: FAQ page, faq what is bitcoin cash

9f2a1753fb523074fcdd70150a5603a7.string: Bitcoin Cash is a peer-to-peer electronic cash system. It's a permissionless, decentralized cryptocurrency that requires no trusted third parties and no central bank.
9f2a1753fb523074fcdd70150a5603a7.developer_comment: FAQ page, faq what is bitcoin cash answer

87f71b72353a11920b45e4cfd625f10f.developer_comment: FAQ page, faq Is Bitcoin Cash different from 'Bitcoin'?

653fd3da0abccfdbb378bf075b6840af.string: In 2017, the Bitcoin project and its community split in two. Perhaps the least controversial way to refer to each side is simply by their respective ticker symbols, BTC and BCH. Bitcoin Cash is usually represented by the BCH ticker symbol and is considered by its supporters to be the legitimate continuation of the Bitcoin project as peer-to-peer digital cash.
653fd3da0abccfdbb378bf075b6840af.developer_comment: FAQ page, faq Is Bitcoin Cash different from 'Bitcoin' answer

87d5ce419b5a5da7dbc85844e3eec49d.developer_comment: FAQ page, Why Use Bitcoin Cash? section title

5ce3c3607a6be9afda56463edfb00dfa.string: Send Money Anywhere In the World, Almost for Free
5ce3c3607a6be9afda56463edfb00dfa.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, Send Almost for Free title

be257141051f1f2b3d520b7441911521.string: With Bitcoin Cash, you can send money to anyone, anywhere in the world, 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Like the Internet itself, the network is always on. No transaction is too big or too small. And you never need anyone’s permission or approval.
be257141051f1f2b3d520b7441911521.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, Send Almost for Free text

bd863d1dece1236861e8159e82e4cefc.string: Be Your Own Bank and Have Full Control Over Your Money
bd863d1dece1236861e8159e82e4cefc.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, Be you own bank title

7c4955fbc9399239d5e2a47394f0681f.string: The seizing of capital from account holders (“bail-ins”) that occurred in Cyprus and nearly in Greece, demonstrated that bank deposits are only as safe as political leaders decide. Even under the best of conditions, banks can make mistakes, hold funds, freeze accounts, and otherwise prevent you from accessing your own money.
7c4955fbc9399239d5e2a47394f0681f.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, be you own bank text

4c133c58b16e75714d1f9d5b1800ae79.string: Banks can also decide to block your transactions, charge you fees, or close your account without warning. Bitcoin Cash gives you full, sovereign control over your funds, which you can access from anywhere in the world.
4c133c58b16e75714d1f9d5b1800ae79.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, be you own bank second text block

89b8a9a584ef9ab6c272ddf04d5af2e4.string: A Scarce Digital Currency with a Known Fixed Supply
89b8a9a584ef9ab6c272ddf04d5af2e4.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, scarce supply title

331bef5c05b320a8c41530799b59fa9e.string: The Bitcoin Cash protocol ensures there will never be more than 21 million coins in existence. Governments continually print money, endlessly inflating the supply and devaluing everyone’s savings. Bitcoin Cash has a fixed supply and therefore represents sound money.
331bef5c05b320a8c41530799b59fa9e.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, scarce supply text

c363a89ba416e4ff37ded38094db030c.string: Increase Your Privacy and Operate Anonymously
c363a89ba416e4ff37ded38094db030c.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, increase privacy title

b91eba2760296a035a891fb5c937f96d.string: Bitcoin Cash offers more privacy and anonymity than traditional payment systems like bank transfers and credit card payments, since it's normally impossible to know who controls a Bitcoin address.
b91eba2760296a035a891fb5c937f96d.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, increase privacy text1

db7e492a5b85bbfe7692642df1857e99.string: Bitcoin Cash offers various levels of privacy depending on how it is used. It's important to educate yourself thoroughly before using Bitcoin Cash for privacy purposes.
db7e492a5b85bbfe7692642df1857e99.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, increase privacy text2

56941c56ff445a1a05773644a6fa2037.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, Enjoy Exclusive Discounts title

bc513a1668a77cf1e2e614a02ff94106.string: Many merchants offer discounts for paying in Bitcoin Cash, because it eliminates credit card fees and helps grow the adoption of this new payment system.
bc513a1668a77cf1e2e614a02ff94106.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, Enjoy Exclusive Discounts text

6d54f0d35dce4daf8d8aab0fbe880708.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, Support Freedom Worldwide title

14bbf01a9648499286cbae56fcd5d5cf.string: Bitcoin Cash is a permissionless, open network. It empowers you to engage with your fellow human beings without intrusion. It's decentralized, voluntary, and non-aggressive. As usage grows, old power structures will erode while fresh ideas blossom. It may help usher in the greatest peaceful revolution the world has ever known.
14bbf01a9648499286cbae56fcd5d5cf.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, Support Freedom Worldwide text

5dc874c22b609ac5900905f17603b0bf.developer_comment: FAQ page, Benefits for Merchants section title

0d9878c92506f6e3ee01e4b10ef67911.developer_comment: FAQ page, merchant benefit section, Low fees title

cc6e9f112d784552c3d26263c74e3ad5.string: The network fee for a typical Bitcoin Cash transaction is less than one penny. If you want to convert your Bitcoin Cash into fiat currency, such as US dollars, you can do that through merchant processors for a cost that is still much lower than credit card processing.
cc6e9f112d784552c3d26263c74e3ad5.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, low fees text

7376727274bf1c9f79d879a4a5bb38d8.developer_comment: FAQ page, merchant benefit section, no chargeback title

56126150403163d5e19d562d5b8876ce.string: Unlike credit cards, there are never any automatic voids, refunds, chargebacks, or other unexpected fees. Fraud protection is built into the system with no cost to the merchant.
56126150403163d5e19d562d5b8876ce.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, no chargeback text

dc9a7d1e3012ee8da65c48685be038f4.developer_comment: FAQ page, merchant benefit section, New Customers title

436c6f204eb09cddbb613b8c1c07ba24.string: A growing number of patrons are choosing Bitcoin Cash as a preferred payment method. They favor merchants who offer this payment option and actively seek them out.
436c6f204eb09cddbb613b8c1c07ba24.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, New Customers text

e8c7411441e74e4056d84b4ac4dc9db4.developer_comment: FAQ page, merchant benefit section, Free Marketing and Press title

134e2d98fdb2059d517782ad148d6af3.string: By accepting Bitcoin Cash, merchants can gain free listings in website and app directories, gaining even more customers. They can also take advantage of this new trend and generate press for their business.
134e2d98fdb2059d517782ad148d6af3.developer_comment: FAQ page, why use section, Free Marketing and Press text

7c9139df0e638be3a4f293fa554a5baf.string: What is peer to peer electronic cash?

534d068868f1f9725a105bc39d264f66.string: Peer to peer (P2P) electronic cash is simply described as online money sent from one person to another without the need for a trusted third-party. As described in the original Bitcoin whitepaper by Satoshi Nakamoto, P2P cash makes use of digital signatures as part of the solution, but the main benefits are lost if a trusted third party is still required to prevent fraud. This makes P2P cash a trustless and safe way to transact without the need of intermediaries.

b1841b456ae95d47de5ecdb526454689.string: The goal for Bitcoin Cash is to become sound money that is usable by everyone in the world. This is a civilization-changing technology which will dramatically increase human freedom and prosperity.

dab8f9be958f8dd4ef7a76f7d090bcaa.string: This roadmap is intended to provide high-level technical direction, and enable different technical teams to work together towards a common goal for advancing Bitcoin Cash. The role of developers in furth ering this goal is to produce high-quality professional software that serves the needs of its users, miners and merchants. We strive for continuous technical improvement, to produce reliable products providing a solid foundation for Bitcoin Cash.

edc3324962ef645e29c41016fd5d6233.string: The basic design of Bitcoin Cash is sound. However, this does not mean it is perfect. It is prudent to make incremental improvements to the system with technically sound design and careful engineering. By implementing optimizations and protocol upgrades, peer-to-peer digital cash will scale many orders of magnitude beyond current limits.

bc1c733635a1765e925baad759278729.string: The needed technical improvements can be divided into three categories:

330fc806c5c3793a47a237ab77f659c4.string: Enable Bitcoin Cash to scale from ~100 Tx/s to over 5,000,000 Tx/s. Protocol improvements must be made so that mass-parallelization can enable this level of transaction processing.

b49cd263cfb4e543f3db1e2ff5c764b9.string: Improving the payment experience to ensure that it is instant and reliable. Transactions should be secure within three seconds.

580458ef8a82dc6d1ad48aaf4cec2b90.string: Make Bitcoin Cash extensible. An extensible protocol makes future improvements less disruptive, and provides a solid base for businesses and developers to build on.

ede0f6a38233fccc685c47f6c138e5a3.string: The Bitcoin Cash network has protocol upgrades twice a year, on November 15th and May 15th. These upgrades are required for all node operators. They are sometimes referred to as "hard fork upgrades", but the term "scheduled protocol upgrades" is preferred.

d55f7f676c1f2e9a8dfbe41fbbb2253d.string: Rather than a specific block height, the upgrades are based on a timestamp. When the median timestamp of the most recent 11 blocks (MTP-11) is greater than or equal to UNIX timestamp of November 15th (or May 15th) 12:00:00 UTC, the new protocol rules take effect. This better enables your business to prepare for the upgrade at a particular estimated time, plus or minus a few hours.

1ec31f9ea0456c8381e204f776ef28bc.string: Although this semi-annual upgrade schedule is not expected to continue forever, it is in place for the forseeable near-term future. Regular protocol upgrades provide a predictable cadence for the ecosystem, and are necessary to achieve the vision set forth in the roadmap.

6e59af9a2000ad59bc5cb5b47a17c2c7.string: To become a solid base for application development and innovation, Bitcoin Cash must continuously improve and compete. Working together, we can build a technical foundation to empower Bitcoin Cash to be the best money the world has ever seen.

b7c1d3ad85e85435585dd5a42bd3e0fc.string: What can I buy with Bitcoin Cash?

edc46b4fa2ee1daf88fc0635ca52ae30.string: Bitcoin Cash isn’t just for speculation. It’s intended usage is a peer to peer electronic currency, which means, it should be spent. Spending Bitcoin Cash is fast, with near-instant transactions and sub-cent transaction fees, making it the most secure and widely used digital currency on the planet.

98de1bb9fab11d069ecb356b5da29844.string: Where can I spend Bitcoin Cash?

96595f0244e74d9bdcc717f7604c7ff7.developer_comment: In the phrase: "Location data by{=Bitcoin.com Maps}"

a2cd44265bdf4d6283b2c218339f7f3d.string: What is peer to peer electronic cash?

db4a06c9ac83047222695fdeab7a53f5.string: Peer to peer (P2P) electronic cash is simply described as online money sent from one person to another without the need for a trusted third-party. As described in the original Bitcoin whitepaper by Satoshi Nakamoto, P2P cash makes use of digital signatures as part of the solution, but the main benefits are lost if a trusted third party is still required to prevent fraud. This makes P2P cash a trustless and safe way to transact without the need of intermediaries.

b3ca007f1440b18c2a9414c45aa30930.developer_comment: 'View More' button on start here page to see more content

370fcbf712cd27345ee3cb129882bb72.string: Where do I store my Bitcoin Cash?

39686bb0751adc2ea460e16907764f21.string: Getting started with Bitcoin Cash is super easy. The first step is to download a wallet so that you can begin participating in the Bitcoin economy. Most wallets are free to download and are easy to use that have a few key features such as sending, receiving, storing funds securely, transaction lookups, and more.

a52662521b616cc5e743a013fab56c13.string: How do I get Bitcoin Cash?

b3fb242ac070953d5104c4f2363bb244.string: The two easiest ways to get Bitcoin Cash is to buy or work for it. Buying Bitcoin Cash is the most used and convenient way, where all you have to do is sign up for a Bitcoin exchange and deposit funds so you can convert it to Bitcoin Cash. The exchange will send you Bitcoin Cash after the trade has occurred.

2ad3d93815fbfa52ab4a6a7824e72e46.string: What can I buy with Bitcoin Cash?

e3976450a07e4c3c1be22c6b4047ac80.string: Bitcoin Cash isn’t just for speculation. It’s intended usage is a peer to peer electronic currency, which means, it should be spent. Spending Bitcoin Cash is fast, with near-instant transactions and sub-cent transaction fees, making it the most secure and widely used digital currency on the planet.

43e340303ba59891b094e701ae8a5219.string: How can my business use Bitcoin Cash?

aab54798d448c24c51e5bb9f65c12fac.string: As a merchant one of your main goals is to be able to accept and process payments as quickly and seamlessly as possible so you can make your customers happy and receive payments without any headaches. Bitcoin Cash is the solution, as it has fast and low-cost transactions. As the world goes digital, electronic currencies such as Bitcoin are becoming the go-to method for paying online and in retail shops. Easily accept Bitcoin Cash directly or use third-party providers to accept Bitcoin Cash using their platforms and convert all or part of the sale into local fiat currency.

cf5bfb3a954b0cc97a5ad1b0df312858.string: Coinbase is a digital currency exchange headquartered in San Francisco, California. They broker exchanges of Bitcoin Cash and other cryptocurrencies with fiat currencies in approximately 32 countries.

52f47801fe8849adcf8e14a4d6ce4529.string: CoinEx is dedicated to building a highly secure, stable and efficient digital coin exchange for global users. CoinEx now supports multiple languages and are providing global trading services in nearly 100 countries/regions.

45f8bafd7d930fd1492accec3dee96b5.string: Kraken is the largest Bitcoin exchange in euro volume and liquidity and also trading Canadian dollars, US dollars, British pounds and Japanese yen. Kraken is consistently rated the best and most secure Bitcoin exchange by independent news media.

13691ba4252beb6502e8bf9a91778aab.string: Start using the Bitcoin.com Wallet for a simple, secure way to send and receive Bitcoin. The wallet supports both Bitcoin Cash (BCH) and Bitcoin Core (BTC), allowing users to switch between the two different currencies effortlessly.

1c4c29060f6485fde9f4f8ed8757b5d6.string: Your private keys are encrypted and never leave your computer. Your funds can be recovered from a secret phrase. Electron Cash is fast, because it uses servers that index the Bitcoin Cash blockchain. You can export your private keys and use them in other Bitcoin Cash clients.
